title: Git & Source Control
description: Source control and developer Git workflows.

tools.name: git
tools.rationale: Core version control system; foundation for all workflows.

tools.name: gh
tools.rationale: GitHub CLI for managing repos, PRs, and issues directly.

tools.name: pre-commit
tools.rationale: Framework for managing Git hooks; enforces checks pre-push.

tools.name: delta
tools.rationale: Improved diff viewer for Git with syntax highlighting.

tools.name: lazygit
tools.rationale: Terminal UI for Git; simplifies commits, merges, and rebases.

tools.name: gitleaks
tools.rationale: Scans repos for hardcoded secrets and sensitive data.

tools.name: git-secrets
tools.rationale: Prevents committing AWS keys and other sensitive credentials.

tools.name: gpg
tools.rationale: Enables commit signing and verification of contributors.
